fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnlFrageamid2.pnlGetContactInfo.gac_GetContactByEmail_EmailAddress"\,"event":"Click"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"testjs();\\nvar vEmailAddress = (emailaddress.value).trim();\\nvar ContactoperationArguments = JSON.stringify({\\n \\"gac_GetContactByEmail_EmailAddress\\": vEmailAddress\\n});\\nif(getDebugMode()){ console.log(\\"--->Search--ContactoperationArguments \\" + ContactoperationArguments);}\\n\\nvar operationName = \\"gac_GetContactByEmail()\\";\\nvar operationArguments = ContactoperationArguments;\\n\\nvar vContactEmailData = execCRMService(operationName\, operationArguments);\\nif(getDebugMode()){ console.log(\\"2-vContactEmailData:\\" + vContactEmailData);}\\n\\nif (vContactEmailData === null) {\\n if(getDebugMode()){ console.log(\\"4-Contact is null\\");}\\n emailaddress.visible = true;\\n noemailexists.visible = true;\\n registernew.visible = true;\\n registernew.enabled = true;\\n}\\nelse {\\n emailaddress.enabled = false;\\n if(getDebugMode()){ console.log(\\"Email Found-contactID: \\" + vContactEmailData.contactid);}\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"contactid\\"\, vContactEmailData.contactid);\\n noemailexists.visible = false;\\n invitecode.visible = true;\\n RedeemInviteCode.visible = true;\\n gac_GetContactByEmail_EmailAddress.visible = false;\\n txInvite.visible = true;\\n RedeemInviteCode.visible = true;\\n}\\n\\n"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:rules.fd:valueCommit: [{"nodeName":"ROOT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"EVENT_CONDITION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EVENT_AND_COMPARISON"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"COMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnleamid2.invitecode"\,"type":"STRING"\,"name":"invitecode"}}\,{"nodeName":"EVENT_AND_COMPARISON_OPERATOR"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"IS_NOT_EMPTY"\,"value":null}}\,{"nodeName":"PRIMITIVE_EXPRESSION"\,"choice":null}]}\,"nested":false}\,{"nodeName":"Then"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"BLOCK_STATEMENTS"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"BLOCK_STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"ENABLE_STATEMENT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnleamid2.RedeemInviteCode"\,"displayName":"RedeemInviteCode"\,"type":"BUTTON"\,"displayPath":"FORM/Root Panel/pnleamid2/RedeemInviteCode/"\,"name":"RedeemInviteCode"\,"parent":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnleamid2"}}]}}]}]}}]\,"isValid":true\,"enabled":true\,"version":1\,"script":"/**\\n\\n * This is a machine-generated code for the rule.\\n * If you modify it in the code editor\, you will not be able to view and edit the rule in the visual editor.\\n */\\n\\nif (( this.value !== null && this.value !== \\"\\" )) {\\n RedeemInviteCode.enabled = true;\\n}\\n"\,"eventName":"Value Commit"\,"ruleType":""\,"description":""}]

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"content":"console.log(\\"Redeem Invite code - Click-Mar31a\\");\\nvar vInviteCode = (invitecode.value).trim();\\n\\n\\nvar redeemOperationArgs = JSON.stringify({\\n \\"contact_contactid\\": sessionStorage.getItem(\\"contactid\\")\,\\n \\"contact_gac_RedeemInviteCode_InviteCode\\": vInviteCode\,\\n \\"contact_gac_RedeemInviteCode_EAMID\\": sessionStorage.getItem(\\"eamid\\")\,\\n \\"contact_gac_RedeemInviteCode_TargetPortalApplication\\": \\"CECI\\"\\n});\\nconsole.log(\\"redeemOperationArgs \\" + redeemOperationArgs);\\nvar operationName = \\"contacts/Microsoft.Dynamics.CRM.gac_RedeemInviteCode()\\";\\nvar operationArguments = redeemOperationArgs;\\nvar vContactRedeemData = execCRMService(operationName\, operationArguments);\\n\\nif ('errorMessage' in vContactRedeemData) {\\n var str = vContactRedeemData.errorMessage;\\n console.log(\\"vContactRedeemData.errorMessage: \\" + vContactRedeemData.errorMessage);\\n str = str.slice(13); // console.log(str.slice(13));\\n var strEndPosition = str.search('\\"');\\n var newStr = str.substring(0\, strEndPosition - 1);\\n newStr = \\"ERROR --- \\" + newStr + \\" --- Please enter another invite code\\";\\n var a = 1;\\n txErrorMessage.value = newStr;\\n txErrorMessage.visible = true;\\n txErrorMessage.enabled = false;\\n} else if ('result' in vContactRedeemData) {\\n console.log(\\"vContactRedeemData.result-->\\" + vContactRedeemData.result);\\n //\\"{\\"result\\":\\"No response\\"}\\"\\n //\\n txMsgRedeemSuccess.visible = true;\\n continue2application.visible = true;\\n this.visible = false;\\n invitecode.enabled = false;\\n this.enable = false;\\n txErrorMessage.visible = false;\\n var vObjData = getContactObj();\\n console.log(\\"vObjData: \\" + vObjData);\\n console.log(\\"vObjData.fullname: \\" + vObjData.fullname);\\n \\n txContact.value = vObjData.fullname;\\n txOrganization.value = vObjData.egcs_PrimaryAccount.egcs_operatingname_en;\\n Start.enabled = true;\\n section1.visible = true;\\n pnlGetContactInfo.visible = false;\\n\\n var vObjData = getFcProfileObjArray(vObjData.egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid);\\n egcs_name_enCFP.value = sessionStorage.getItem(\\"cfp\\"); //cfp \\n Proposal.value = sessionStorage.getItem(\\"proposalName\\"); //proposalName\\n \\n var callStatus = checkCFP4StartClose();\\n console.log(\\"callStatus: \\" + callStatus);\\n\\n if (callStatus == \\"cBeforeCallStart\\") {\\n console.log(\\" Today is less than start\\");\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.title = \\"Inactive\\";\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.enabled = false;\\n }\\n else if (callStatus == \\"cAfterCallClose\\") {\\n console.log(\\" is greater than close\\");\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.title = \\"Closed\\";\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.enabled = false;\\n }\\n else {\\n if ((sessionStorage.getItem(\\"gac_fundingapplicationstatus\\")) == \\"810510001\\") {\\n Start.title = \\"Submitted\\";\\n }\\n else {\\n console.log(\\"between start and close\\");\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"gac-aem-appId\\"\, vRdmsTargetEnvProposalAppId);\\n console.log(\\"gac-aem-appId: \\" + vRdmsTargetEnvProposalAppId);\\n var vDraftId = getDraftId(sessionStorage.getItem(\\"accountid\\")\, sessionStorage.getItem(\\"foprofileid\\"));\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"gac_saveddraftid\\"\, vDraftId);\\n if ((vDraftId === null || vDraftId === \\"\\")) {\\n var vProfileID = createStubProposal();\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"fcprofileid\\"\, vProfileID);\\n }\\n else {\\n var buttonValues = getDraftProposalStatusReturn2();// the following 3 lines added to get and return button title and dis/enable\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.title = buttonValues[0];\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.enabled = buttonValues[1];\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n\\n}\\n\\n"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnlFrageamid2.pnlGetContactInfo.RedeemInviteCode"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

guidetextdraw_101963._value: The code has been successfully redeemed. Please click the button "Continue to Application", to proceed.
guidetextdraw_101963.name: txMsgRedeemSuccess

fd:rules.fd:click: [{"nodeName":"ROOT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"EVENT_CONDITION"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"EVENT_AND_COMPARISON"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"COMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnlFrageamid2.pnlGetContactInfo.continue2application"\,"type":"BUTTON"\,"name":"continue2application"}}\,{"nodeName":"EVENT_AND_COMPARISON_OPERATOR"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"is clicked"\,"value":null}}\,{"nodeName":"PRIMITIVE_EXPRESSION"\,"choice":null}]}\,"nested":false}\,{"nodeName":"Then"\,"value":null}\,{"nodeName":"BLOCK_STATEMENTS"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"BLOCK_STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"SHOW_STATEMENT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"guide.guideRootPanel.section1"\,"displayName":"Section 1"\,"type":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"displayPath":"FORM/Root Panel/Section 1/"\,"name":"section1"\,"parent":"guide.guideRootPanel"}}]}}\,{"nodeName":"BLOCK_STATEMENT"\,"choice":{"nodeName":"HIDE_STATEMENT"\,"items":[{"nodeName":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"value":{"id":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnlFrageamid2"\,"displayName":"pnlFrageamid2"\,"type":"AFCOMPONENT"\,"displayPath":"FORM/Root Panel/pnlFrageamid2/"\,"name":"pnlFrageamid2"\,"parent":"guide.guideRootPanel"}}]}}]}]}}]\,"isValid":true\,"enabled":true\,"version":1\,"script":"/**\\n * WHEN Done is clicked THEN Disable invitecode Disable RedeemInviteCode\\n *\\n * This is a machine-generated code for the rule.\\n * If you modify it in the code editor\, you will not be able to view and edit the rule in the visual editor.\\n */\\n\\nsection1.visible = true;\\npnlFrageamid2.visible = false;\\n\\n"\,"eventName":"Click"\,"ruleType":""\,"description":""}]

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"content":"var vAccountID = createAccountExec(\\"aaaEgcs_operatingname_en\\");\\nconsole.log(\\"landingPage->Jun30a-Register new contact - Click - vAccountID: \\"+vAccountID);\\n//guideRootPanel.contactid.value = test4();\\n//var vContactID = createContactExec(\\"aaaFirstname\\"\, \\"aaaEmail\\"\, vAccountID); bb-Aug2-commented this line\\n//console.log(\\"Register new contact - Click - vContactID: \\"+vContactID);\\nsessionStorage.setItem(\\"gac-aem-masterId\\"\,vAccountID);\\nsessionStorage.setItem(\\"gac-aem-appId\\"\,vRdmsTargetEnvAccountAppId);\\nconsole.log(\\"Register new contact - Click: gac-aem-appId = \\"+ vRdmsTargetEnvAccountAppId);\\n\\n//Aug3-cs-removed 'wcmmode=disabled' per request from PatV since AEM Dispatcher Blocks it.\\n//Aug3-cs-added the following line to fetch URL param 'afAcceptLang'\, then append to destination URL\, to support language workflow.\\n//Aug3-cs-Note to use 'lang' setting you need 'urlParams' setting as well.\\nvar urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar lang = urlParams.get('afAcceptLang');\\nsessionStorage.setItem(\\"lang\\"\,lang);\\n\\nwindow.open('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/ceci/registration_form/jcr:content?' + 'afAcceptLang=' +lang\,'_self');\\n\\n//below opens in new tab---> do not use\\n//guidelib.util.GuideUtil.navigateToURL('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/ceci/proposal_form/jcr:content?wcmmode=disabled'\,'_self');\\n\\n"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.pnlFrageamid2.pnlGetContactInfo.registernew"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

headerItem1588878645564._value: Please click button "Start" to create new Proposal
headerItem1588878645564.name: Proposal

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"content":"//LandingPage-Click-Start-Edit--- can be either\\nconsole.log(\\"#--- LandingPage - Click-Start-TOP-Sep14a\\");\\ntestjs();\\n// June 16 Delete since its set in the CreateStubProposal Code Section in fdmfuncs\\nsessionStorage.setItem(\\"gac_fundingapplicationstatus\\"\, \\"810510000\\");\\n\\nvar vDebugMode = \\"\\";\\nif (getDebugMode()) {\\n vDebugMode = \\"&afDebug\\";\\n console.log(\\"#--- LandingPage - Click-Start-Edit-Button\\");\\n}\\n\\nvar urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar lang = urlParams.get('afAcceptLang');\\nsessionStorage.setItem(\\"lang\\"\, lang);\\n\\nvar vGac_saveddraftid = sessionStorage.getItem(\\"gac_saveddraftid\\");\\nif (!vGac_saveddraftid) {\\n //besco-Sep30 --> the following two lines moved from button \\"redeemInviteCode\\" \\n //if (vGac_saveddraftid == 'null') {\\n console.log(\\"inside createStub test - set to empty string\\");\\n var vFcprofileid = createStubProposal();\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"fcprofileid\\"\, vFcprofileid);\\n}\\nwindow.open('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/ceci/proposal_form/jcr:content?' + 'afAcceptLang=' + lang + vDebugMode\, '_self');\\n\\n//below opens in new tab---> do not use\\n//guidelib.util.GuideUtil.navigateToURL('/content/dam/formsanddocuments/ceci/proposal_form/jcr:content?wcmmode=disabled'\,'_self');\\n\\n"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.section1.pnlLandingPage.tblProposals.Row1.Start"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

[{"script":{"content":"console.log(\\"PnlClaims\\" + \\": \\" + \\"Guide Root Panel View Claims - Click\\" + \\": \\" + \\"Dec08A\\" + \\" \\" + \\"2022\\");\\ntestjs();\\nconsole.log(\\"pnlclaims-Click 'View claims'\\" + sessionStorage.getItem(\\"fcprofileid\\"));\\nthis.enabled = false; // do not allow user to click again\, creating a duplicate list of claims\\n\\nvGac_timeperiodid = tblProposalsPrevious.Row1.gac_timeperiodid.value;\\nsessionStorage.setItem(\\"cfp\\"\, oegcs_name_enCFP.value);\\n\\nclaimsJsonObj = getClaims(vPreviousFcProfileId);\\nif (Array.isArray(claimsJsonObj)) {\\n console.log(\\"claimsJsonObj length = \\" + claimsJsonObj.length);\\n txClaimRowCount.value = claimsJsonObj.length;\\n // pnlclaims.visible = true;\\n guideRootPanel.section1.pnlLandingPage.pnlclaims.visible = true;\\n guideRootPanel.section1.pnlLandingPage.pnlclaims.tblClaimsList.visible = true;\\n guideRootPanel.section1.pnlLandingPage.pnlclaims.tblClaimsList.visible = true;\\n // guideRootPanel.section1.pnlLandingPage.pnlclaims.TitlePnl1.visible = true;\\n guideRootPanel.section1.pnlLandingPage.pnlclaims.btSubmitClaim.visible = true;\\n\\n // for dev & testing only... \\n// pnlClaimInfo.visible = true;\\n\\n txNoClaims.visible = false;\\n var gac_name = claimsJsonObj[0].gac_name;\\n console.log(\\"claimsJsonObj gac_name = \\" + gac_name);\\n\\n var destObj = guideRootPanel.section1.pnlLandingPage.pnlclaims.tblClaimsList.Row1;\\n console.log(\\"destObj.instanceManager.instances[0].iclaimtitle = \\" + destObj.instanceManager.instances[0].iclaimtitle.value);\\n var strDate = \\"\\";\\n\\n for (var i = 0; i < claimsJsonObj.length; i++) {\\n console.log(\\"i: \\" + i);\\n if (i > 0) destObj.instanceManager.insertInstance();\\n var buttonValues = getClaimButtonLabelEnable(claimsJsonObj[i].statuscode);\\n //buttonValues is an array\, [0] item is the 'Status column' text\\n // [1] item determines the lable for the 'Edit'Details' button\\n var statusColumnText = 0;\\n var buttonEnabled = 1;\\n var vButtonLabel = \\"\\";\\n destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].btGotoClaims.title = buttonValues[statusColumnText];\\n // destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].btDetails.enabled = buttonValues[1];\\n\\n if ((buttonValues[0] != \\"Processed\\") && (buttonValues[0] != \\"traité\\")) {\\n btSubmitClaim.enabled = false;\\n txPleaseNoteClaim.visible = true;\\n }\\n if (buttonValues[buttonEnabled]) {\\n vButtonLabel = vLang === \\"en\\" ? \\"Edit\\" : \\"Modifier\\";\\n destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].btGotoClaims.title = vButtonLabel;\\n btSubmitClaim.enabled = false;\\n txPleaseNoteClaim.visible = true;\\n } else {\\n vButtonLabel = vLang === \\"en\\" ? \\"Details\\" : \\"Détails\\";\\n destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].btGotoClaims.title = vButtonLabel;\\n destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].btGotoClaims.enabled = true; //Besco-Jun13-allow user to click button and open Claims WITH r/o fields\\n }\\n if (txMaxNumClaims.value == txClaimRowCount.value) {\\n txMaxNumberSubmitted.visible = true;\\n txPleaseNoteClaim.visible = false;\\n btSubmitClaim.enabled = false;\\n }\\n if ((txMaxNumClaims.value - txClaimRowCount.value) == 1) {\\n txFinalClaim.visible = true;\\n vIsFinalClaim = 1;\\n txPleaseNoteClaim.visible = false;\\n }\\n\\n destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].iclaimtitle.value = claimsJsonObj[i].gac_name;\\n destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].iclaimnum.value = claimsJsonObj[i].gac_claimnumber;\\n destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].iclaimamount.value = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-CA'\, {\\n style: 'currency'\,\\n currency: 'CAD'\\n }).format(claimsJsonObj[i].gac_totalapprovedpayment);\\n\\n // when a claim is in \\"draft\\"\, gac_datesubmitted will be null\, otherwise\, it is a valid date object\, so split off time. besco\\n strDate = claimsJsonObj[i].gac_datesubmitted;\\n if (strDate === null) destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].iclaimdate.value = \\"\\";\\n else destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].iclaimdate.value = strDate.split(\\"T\\")[0];\\n\\n //hidden values below are required for passing to Claims_Form via sessionstore\\n destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].gac_fdiclaimid.value = claimsJsonObj[i].gac_fdiclaimid;\\n destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].strStatus.value = buttonValues[statusColumnText]; // 'buttonValues' array item [0]\\n\\n console.log(\\"claimsJsonObj[i].statuscode = \\" + claimsJsonObj[i].statuscode);\\n }\\n} else {\\n if (claimsJsonObj.result.toLowerCase() === \\"No response\\".toLowerCase()) {\\n console.log(\\"No Claims\\");\\n txNoClaims.visible = true;\\n // pnlclaims.visible = false;\\n tblClaimsList.visible = false;\\n guideRootPanel.section1.pnlLandingPage.pnlclaims.btSubmitClaim.visible = true;\\n }\\n}\\nconsole.log(\\"******execCRMServiceAjax_ceciclaim - Click - DONE\\");"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.section1.pnlLandingPage.tblProposalsPrevious.Row1.Details"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:init: [{"script":{"content":"console.log(\\"landingPage\\" + \\": \\" + \\"Root Panel - Initialize\\" + \\": \\" + \\"Mar20a\\" + \\" \\" + \\"2023\\");\\n// Mar20a: 5147 only display \\"My Previous Proposals using \\"gac_isclaimable\\"\\ntestjs();\\nvar urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\\nvar lang = urlParams.get('afAcceptLang');\\nsetDebugMode();\\nsessionStorage.setItem(\\"gac_saveddraftid\\"\, \\"\\"); //besco-init 'gac_saveddraftid' since it may have a 'get' later\\nsessionStorage.setItem(\\"gac-aem-appId\\"\, vRdmsTargetEnvProposalAppId);\\n\\nvar vContactDataStr = sessionStorage.getItem(\\"contactObj\\"); //\\nvar vContactData = JSON.parse(vContactDataStr);\\nvar vFlagCurrentProposalStarted = false;\\n//var callStatus = \\"\\";\\n//var callStatus = checkCFP4StartClose();\\nvar vIsCurrent = \\"\\";\\nvar vIsEditable = \\"\\";\\nvar vIsClaimable = \\"\\";\\n\\n\\nif (vContactData === null) {\\n console.log(\\"--> Contact is null\\");\\n emailaddress.visible = true;\\n gac_GetContactByEmail_EmailAddress.visible = true;\\n txPleaseEnterInvite.visible = true;\\n section1.visible = false;\\n pnlGetContactInfo.visible = true;\\n\\n} else {\\n console.log(\\"vContactData:\\" + vContactData);\\n section1.visible = true;\\n pnlGetContactInfo.visible = false;\\n txContact.value = vContactData.fullname;\\n txOrganization.value = vContactData.egcs_PrimaryAccount.egcs_operatingname_en;\\n\\n// var vProposalObjArray = getfcProfileViaAcctAndIsClaimable(vContactData.egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid);\\n var vObjData = getfcProfileViaAcctAndIsClaimable(vContactData.egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid);\\n\\n// var vObjData = getFcProfileObjArray(vContactData.egcs_PrimaryAccount.accountid);\\n if (!Array.isArray(vObjData)) {\\n console.log(\\"There is NO array of data\\");\\n\\n if (vObjData.result.toLowerCase() === (\\"No response\\").toLowerCase()) {\\n tblProposalsPrevious.visible = false; // hide \\"Previous Proposals\\"\\n console.log(\\"No Proposal Yet\\");\\n }\\n }\\n else { // there is an array of Proposal(s) for this ACCOUNT\\n var destObj = guideRootPanel.section1.pnlLandingPage.tblProposalsPrevious.Row1;\\n for (var i = 0; i < vObjData.length; i++) {\\n var obj = vObjData[i];\\n // move this to the TOP --- Besco-PJS-Oct17-2022\\n // callStatus = checkCFP4StartClose();\\n console.log(obj.gac_CallYear.gac_period);\\n if (obj.gac_CallYear.gac_period == \\"2020\\") {\\n vFlagCurrentProposalStarted = true;\\n console.log(\\"between start and close\\");\\n // callStatus = \\"cDuringCall\\";\\n guideRootPanel.section1.pnlLandingPage.tblProposals.Row1.egcs_name_enCFP.value = obj.egcs_FundingOpportunity.egcs_name; //cfp \\n tblProposals.Row1.Proposal.value = obj.egcs_name;\\n continue2application.visible = true;\\n\\n section1.visible = true;\\n pnlGetContactInfo.visible = false;\\n\\n // var callStatus = checkCFP4StartClose();\\n console.log(\\"callStatus: \\" + callStatus);\\n\\n if (callStatus == \\"cBeforeCallStart\\") {\\n console.log(\\" Today is less than start\\");\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.title = \\"Inactive\\";\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.enabled = false;\\n }\\n else if (callStatus == \\"cAfterCallClose\\") {\\n console.log(\\" is greater than close\\");\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.title = \\"Closed\\";\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.enabled = false;\\n }\\n else {\\n if ((sessionStorage.getItem(\\"gac_fundingapplicationstatus\\")) == \\"810510001\\") {\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.title = \\"Submitted\\";\\n tblProposals.Row1.Start.enabled = false;\\n }\\n else {\\n console.log(\\"between start and close\\");\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"gac-aem-appId\\"\, vRdmsTargetEnvProposalAppId);\\n console.log(\\"gac-aem-appId: \\" + vRdmsTargetEnvProposalAppId);\\n var vDraftId = getDraftId(sessionStorage.getItem(\\"accountid\\")\, sessionStorage.getItem(\\"foprofileid\\"));\\n sessionStorage.setItem(\\"gac_saveddraftid\\"\, vDraftId);\\n if ((vDraftId === null || vDraftId === \\"\\")) {\\n // var vProfileID = createStubProposal();tblProposals.Row1.Proposal\,COMPONENT\\n // sessionStorage.setItem(\\"fcprofileid\\"\, vProfileID);tblProposalsPrevious.Row1.Proposal\,COMPONENT\\n Start.enabled = true;\\n statuscode.value = 1;\\n }\\n else {\\n statuscode.value = 1;\\n var buttonValues = getProposalButtonLabelEnable(obj.statuscode);// the following 3 lines added to get and return button title and dis/enable\\n section1.pnlLandingPage.tblProposals.Row1.statuscode.value = buttonValues[2];\\n section1.pnlLandingPage.tblProposals.Row1.Start.title = buttonValues[0];\\n section1.pnlLandingPage.tblProposals.Row1.Start.enabled = buttonValues[1];\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n else { // NOT '2023' gac_isclaimable\\n console.log(\\"obj.gac_CallYear.gac_period\\" + obj.gac_CallYear.gac_period);\\n vPreviousFcProfileId = obj.egcs_fc_profileid;\\n guideRootPanel.section1.pnlLandingPage.tblProposalsPrevious.Row1.oegcs_name_enCFP.value = obj.egcs_FundingOpportunity.egcs_name;\\n
